thread.title: Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live' in November
thread.title_full: Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live' in November - POLITICO

title: Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live' in November
text:
Presidential candidate and television star Donald Trump is scheduled to host "Saturday Night Live" on Nov. 7, NBC announced in a release. Trump is obviously no stranger to the small screen or late night television. On the Democratic side, Hillary Clinton made an appearance in the show's season debut last weekend.
Trump has hosted the late-night comedy show before, back in 2004.
